Leading a dedicated team of talented professionals as we bring the latest technology innovations to the Asia-Pacific market.
Senior Manager, Professional Applications Strategic Marketing, Asia

Led Apple's professional applications market development in Japan and Asia-Pacific, driving adoption of professional video solutions to broadcast and post-production markets. Successfully managed and led product marketing, key account marketing and new market development to increase market share in Japan, as well as grew division business throughout Asia.

Researched and designed processes to streamline management of corporate events. Developed database application to track all Apple-related events and track ROI, then led a 5 person development team to create an internal online event management system.

recommendations: Michael Uy
Founder & CEO
December 12, 2012, Eric worked with Michael in the same group

Eric is a solid global business professional. I've worked with him both Stateside and in Japan, and he is always proven to be reliable, insightful, and outstandingly personable. He has literally been the guy who wraps up a deal, and makes you want to go grab a beer with him afterwards.While many note that Eric's most valuable asset is his Japanese fluency - as someone who's equally fluent, I would say that it's actually his personal brand of diplomacy and mission-focus that distinguishes him more as an asset to an organization. Pair Eric with a translator for any territory where he doesn't speak the language, and he'll achieve the business objective on a shoestring budget, and bring back a network of strategic partners.I've been proud to work with Eric, and consider him a cornerstone of my professional network to this day.

Senior Manager, Creative Pro Partnership Management at Apple

Eric is known company-wide for his Asian market knowledge and fluency in Japanese which makes him invaluable to our efforts in Asia. What is not generally known about Eric is the ability to work in the style of the local culture, whether Beijing, Mumbai, or Toyko, yet be effective in delivering results back to the home office. He's a strategic thinker who can creatively apply the resources at hand to solve problems for company and customer alike. He is critical to our division's success in Japan, and dogged in his efforts to break the status quo. I'm proud to be working with Eric and happy he's on my team and not the competition.

summary: Highly effective and motivated technology executive with a proven track record in leading top companies in Asia-Pacific focused on new and innovative video and internet technologies. Extensive experience developing and managing diverse P & Ls for global technology companies with a concentration on managing divisions and companies in Japan, China and greater Asia.Looking for opportunities to build and lead extraordinary technology companies.Specialties: technology marketing, international business, cross-cultural management & communications, cross-cultural brand management, new market penetration & business development, advertising, strategic partnership management, fluent Japanese (spoken, reading/writing), professional video (broadcast, post-production, cinema), internet content development and distribution.
